description_text:
Bonjour Simsonn

Can we agrée on a 3 ٪ commissiön, If I can bring in $10k revenue for you

conversations.body_text: Hi Abios,      You can join our Affiliate Program and earn a commission rate of 6-15%:  https://www.simsonn.com/pages/affiliate-program
